<languages/> '''Weather''' is a game mechanic reflecting atmospheric conditions that affects Pokémon attack values of certain types. It changes every four hours and certain weather conditions can only occur in specific [[Regions]]. Weather also restricts the evolution and in-route availability of certain Pokémon.
=Details=
The table below is accurate as of version 0.8.15.
